tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcılık, hata yapmanıza izin vermenizdir. Sanat, bu hatalardan hangilerinin korunacağını bilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Scott Adams

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey ele geçince hayalde olduğu kadar güzel kalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: N.Richard Nash

tr_quotes.quote: Kırarlar diye hayal kurmaktan vazgeçilmez.
tr_quotes.author: İlhan Berk

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü şiddetli bir şekilde rahatsız edilirse uzaktaki bir nesneyi vurabilecek oklar fırlatır.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Önce içindeki toprağı verimli hale getirmelisin. Şayet senin için kuru bir çöle dönmüşse, oraya gül de eksen ot verecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: Herhangi bir sorunu çözmek istiyorsanız şu üç soruyu kendinize sorun: Ne yapabilirim? Ne okuyabilirim? Kime sorabilirim?
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Zorluklar yaratıcılığı ortaya çıkarır; rahat ve tembellik ise bu özelliği kaybettirir.
tr_quotes.author: Walter Haworth

tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcı düşünmek demek keşfetmek, denemek, gelişmek, risk almak, kuralları yıkmak, hatalar yapmak ve eğlenmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Mary Lou Cook

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük işler, büyük hayaller kurma özelliği olan insanlarca başarılmıştır.
tr_quotes.author: William Russell

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes düşlerinin büyüklüğü kadar özgürdür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar, hayal güçleriyle idare edilirler.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan inciyi denizden çıkarmayı bilmezse, o, ha inci olmuş, ha çakıl taşı!
tr_quotes.author: Yusuf Has Hacib

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin hayal gücüyle, düşlerinin gerçekleşmesi arasındaki mesafe, yalnızca onun yoğun isteğiyle aşılabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

tr_quotes.quote: En fakir insan bir kuruşu olmayan değil, bir hayali olmayandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendin için bir bolluk yaratmak istiyorsan, bunu bir başkası için yarat.
tr_quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

tr_quotes.quote: Bir makine, sıradan 50 kişinin yapabileceği işi yapar. Sıradışı bir insanın yapabileceği işi ise hiçbir makine yapamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyayı hayal gücü döndürür.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni düşünceleri ortaya çıkaran hayal gücü bilinçten önemlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcılık, kesinlikten kurtulma cesaretini getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü ne ilahi bir armağandır.
tr_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan alemde hayal ettiği müddetçe yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: Yahya Kemal

tr_quotes.quote: Bir adamın yüzü otobiyografisidir. Bir kadının yüzü ise hayal gücünün eseri.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Daha önce hiç sahip olmadığın bir şeye sahip olmak istiyorsan, daha önce hiç yapmadığın bir şey yapmalısın.
tr_quotes.author: Peseschkian

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü olmadan suçlu da olmazdı şair de.
tr_quotes.author: Curt Goetz

tr_quotes.quote: Bırakın, gençler dünyayı düşledikleri gibi görsünler. Nasıl olsa büyüdükçe olduğu gibi görecekler.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimdeki her büyük ilerleyiş, hayal gücünün yeni bir atağından ileri gelir.
tr_quotes.author: John Dewey

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü, ruhun gözüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllı adam, bulduğundan daha fazla fırsat yaratan adamdır.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü olmayan insanın kanatları yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Muhammed Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Endişe, hayal gücünün yanlış kullanımıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Zadra

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü olan insanlar görülemeyen şeyleri görürler.
tr_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcılık, bildiğiniz iki şeyi bilmediğiniz bir şekilde birbirine bağlamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Leo Burnett

tr_quotes.quote: Düşlerinizi kovmayın, çünkü onlar gidince belki siz kalırsınız ama artık yaşamıyorsunuz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

tr_quotes.quote: Bence yaratıcı insanlar ve yazarların gerçekten aklından eline dökülüyor ve onlarda sadece yazıyorlar. Bu kadar basit.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Mc. Cartney

tr_quotes.quote: Delilik, aynı şeyi tekrar tekrar yapıp farklı sonuçlar beklemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Evet, ben bir hayalperestim. Bir hayalperest yolunu yalnız ay ışığında bulabildiğinden, cezası, şafağı dünyanın geri kalanından daha önce görmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcı insan başarma arzusu ile motive olur, başkalarını geçme arzusu ile değil.
tr_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

tr_quotes.quote: Yaratıcı düşünmek olmayan ilişkileri görebilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Disch

en_quotes.quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality
en_quotes.author: Jonas Salk

en_quotes.quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Our thoughts and imagination are the only real limits to our possibilities
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: There are lots of people who mistake their imagination for their memory
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it
en_quotes.author: Robin Williams

en_quotes.quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: When you're curious, you find lots of interesting things to do
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night
en_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

en_quotes.quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: Visualize this thing that you want, see it, feel it, believe in it. Make your mental blue print, and begin to build
en_quotes.author: Robert Collier

en_quotes.quote: You have to really use your imagination to refresh your daily life
en_quotes.author: Eric-Emmanuel Schmitt

en_quotes.quote: I do not stick to rules when cooking. I rely on my imagination
en_quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

en_quotes.quote: Fantasy mirrors desire. Imagination reshapes it
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: For me, insanity is super sanity. The normal is psychotic. Normal means lack of imagination, lack of creativity
en_quotes.author: Jean Dubuffet

en_quotes.quote: Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy working on a movie that lets your imagination run wild, it's great to be a part of and watch
en_quotes.author: Chris Hemsworth

en_quotes.quote: I love fantasy; I love imagination - that's the inner child in me
en_quotes.author: Hannah John-Kamen

en_quotes.quote: Girls are capable of doing everything men are capable of doing. Sometimes they have more imagination than men
en_quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I like nonsense; it wakes up the brain cells
en_quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

en_quotes.quote: The visionary starts with a clean sheet of paper, and re-imagines the world
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

en_quotes.quote: My imagination is a monastery and I am its monk
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: True change takes place in the imagination
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: When you believe in what you're doing and use your imagination and initiative, you can make a difference
en_quotes.author: Samuel Dash

en_quotes.quote: Generally speaking, a howling wilderness does not howl: it is the imagination of the traveler that does the howling
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: I'm an optimistic guy. I'm one of those big dreamers. I'm one of those kids with that annoying imagination
en_quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

en_quotes.quote: It is the eye of ignorance that assigns a fixed and unchangeable color to every object; beware of this stumbling block
en_quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the true magic carpet
en_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

en_quotes.quote: Like all novelists, I'm interested in the filters between reality and the imagination
en_quotes.author: Hisham Matar

en_quotes.quote: Uttering a word is like striking a note on the keyboard of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

en_quotes.quote: Life is not so bad if you have plenty of luck, a good physique, and not too much imagination
en_quotes.author: Christopher Isherwood

en_quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: Few people have the imagination for reality
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I only hope that we don't lose sight of one thing - that it was all started by a mouse
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: You can't do it unless you can imagine it
en_quotes.author: George Lucas

en_quotes.quote: Creativity is putting your imagination to work, and it's produced the most extraordinary results in human culture
en_quotes.author: Ken Robinson

en_quotes.quote: To have a great idea, have a lot of them
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Imagination rules the world
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: I want to reach the heights of stardom beyond my imagination
en_quotes.author: Ranbir Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: When something is such a creative medium as the web, the limits to it are our imagination
en_quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

en_quotes.quote: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: I imagine that yes is the only living thing
en_quotes.author: e. e. cummings

en_quotes.quote: I believed in myself. I never imagined myself as just an ordinary player
en_quotes.author: Imran Khan

en_quotes.quote: Living in a small town, one of the keys to survival was your imagination
en_quotes.author: Nick Nolte

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: The saddest thing I can imagine is to get used to luxury
en_quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

en_quotes.quote: Imagination... its limits are only those of the mind itself
en_quotes.author: Rod Serling

en_quotes.quote: Nature's imagination is so boundless compared to our own meager human imagination
en_quotes.author: James Cameron

en_quotes.quote: Vulgarity begins when imagination succumbs to the explicit
en_quotes.author: Doris Day

en_quotes.quote: My imagination is so far out there already. People couldn't imagine what goes on in my brain
en_quotes.author: Missy Elliott

en_quotes.quote: I used to lie in bed in my flat and imagine what would happen if there was a zombie attack
en_quotes.author: Simon Pegg

en_quotes.quote: Doubt is the father of invention
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Do not quench your inspiration and your imagination; do not become the slave of your model
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: No amount of skillful invention can replace the essential element of imagination
en_quotes.author: Edward Hopper

en_quotes.quote: It is usually the imagination that is wounded first, rather than the heart; it being much more sensitive
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: If you want a vision of the future, imagine a boot stamping on a human face - forever
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: The imagination imitates. It is the critical spirit that creates
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is a beast that has to be put in a cage
en_quotes.author: Timothy Spall

en_quotes.quote: Wine and women do not go with song. Alcohol is the worst enemy of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Patrick Kavanagh

en_quotes.quote: Kashmir, the 86,000-square-mile region in India's north, both is and isn't the India of the popular imagination
en_quotes.author: Hanya Yanagihara

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the highest kite one can fly
en_quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

en_quotes.quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality
en_quotes.author: Jonas Salk

en_quotes.quote: Reason clears and plants the wilderness of the imagination to harvest the wheat of art
en_quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

en_quotes.quote: Imagination creates reality
en_quotes.author: Richard Wagner

en_quotes.quote: Those who do not want to imitate anything, produce nothing
en_quotes.author: Salvador Dali

en_quotes.quote: Obviously the imagination is fueled by emotions beyond the control of the conscious mind
en_quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

en_quotes.quote: A great wind is blowing, and that gives you either imagination or a headache
en_quotes.author: Catherine the Great

en_quotes.quote: The imagination is the golden pathway to everywhere
en_quotes.author: Terence McKenna

en_quotes.quote: I always wanted to ride a dragon myself, so I decided to do this for a year in my imagination
en_quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

en_quotes.quote: Illustrations can be a big window: a looking glass into the author's imagination
en_quotes.author: Tony DiTerlizzi

en_quotes.quote: It's through the small things that we develop our moral imagination, so that we can understand the sufferings of others
en_quotes.author: Alexander McCall Smith

en_quotes.quote: Television contracts the imagination and radio expands it
en_quotes.author: Terry Wogan

en_quotes.quote: If you're not a daydreamer, you haven't got any imagination
en_quotes.author: David Cassidy

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the real and eternal world of which this vegetable universe is but a faint shadow
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is a very potent thing, and in the uneducated often usurps the place of genuine experience
en_quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

en_quotes.quote: Personally, I would sooner have written Alice in Wonderland than the whole Encyclopedia Britannica
en_quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

en_quotes.quote: Our imagination is the only limit to what we can hope to have in the future
en_quotes.author: Charles Kettering

en_quotes.quote: The Christian faith is the most exciting drama that ever staggered the imagination of man - and the dogma is the drama
en_quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

en_quotes.quote: To speak of morals in art is to speak of legislature in sex. Art is the sex of the imagination
en_quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

en_quotes.quote: Imagination allows you to bend the rules of the temporal world
en_quotes.author: Amy Sherald

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is like the drunk man who lost his watch and must get drunk again to find it
en_quotes.author: Guy Davenport

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the voice of daring. If there is anything Godlike about God it is that. He dared to imagine everything
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: I'm very conscious that people dear to me are alive in my imagination - poets in particular
en_quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

en_quotes.quote: I think about freedom and the urgency around our imagination. If you can't imagine it, you can't fight for it
en_quotes.author: DeRay Mckesson

en_quotes.quote: Jehovah God is truly rich far beyond the imagination of humankind
en_quotes.author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

en_quotes.quote: The Mafia exists in the American imagination because we want it to exist
en_quotes.author: Pete Hamill

en_quotes.quote: In imagination, there's no limitation
en_quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

en_quotes.quote: I do like to wrap things up and leave some things to the readers' imagination
en_quotes.author: Rick Riordan

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible
en_quotes.author: Ida Tarbell

en_quotes.quote: The artist must bow to the monster of his own imagination
en_quotes.author: Richard Wright

en_quotes.quote: Solitude is as needful to the imagination as society is wholesome for the character
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: Imagination and fiction make up more than three quarters of our real life
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: The courage to imagine the otherwise is our greatest resource, adding color and suspense to all our life
en_quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is at the root of much that passes for love
en_quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

en_quotes.quote: True originality consists not in a new manner but in a new vision
en_quotes.author: Edith Wharton

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the eye of the soul
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: The lunatic, the lover, and the poet, are of imagination all compact
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The debt we owe to the play of imagination is incalculable
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: I cannot imagine a God who rewards and punishes the objects of his creation and is but a reflection of human frailty
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: I had a very happy childhood, but I still used my imagination as a leisure resort
en_quotes.author: Geraldine McCaughrean

en_quotes.quote: America is a poem in our eyes; its ample geography dazzles the imagination, and it will not wait long for metres
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: My reality needs imagination like a bulb needs a socket. My imagination needs reality like a blind man needs a cane
en_quotes.author: Tom Waits

en_quotes.quote: The nose of a mob is its imagination. By this, at any time, it can be quietly led
en_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

en_quotes.quote: What we wish, we readily believe, and what we ourselves think, we imagine others think also
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination
en_quotes.author: John Lennon

en_quotes.quote: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing
en_quotes.author: Marc Chagall

en_quotes.quote: I'm a dreamer with lots of energy and a vivid imagination. That's the recipe for becoming an entertainer
en_quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

en_quotes.quote: Cowardice... is almost always simply a lack of ability to suspend functioning of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: Aptitude found in the understanding and is often inherited. Genius coming from reason and imagination, rarely
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: Great ideas originate in the muscles
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: What is now proved was once only imagined
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: To bring anything into your life, imagine that it's already there
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Be drawn to the visual arts for it can expand your imagination
en_quotes.author: Barbara Januszkiewicz

en_quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: We say God and the imagination are one... How high that highest candle lights the dark
en_quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

en_quotes.quote: Boredom is your imagination calling to you
en_quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

en_quotes.quote: Halloween is not only about putting on a costume, but it's about finding the imagination and costume within ourselves
en_quotes.author: Elvis Duran

en_quotes.quote: The moment a person forms a theory, his imagination sees in every object only the traits which favor that theory
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: I try to decorate my imagination as much as I can
en_quotes.author: Franz Schubert

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I feel like a figment of my own imagination
en_quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

en_quotes.quote: Nobody is bored when he is trying to make something that is beautiful, or to discover something that is true
en_quotes.author: William Inge

en_quotes.quote: The human race is governed by its imagination
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: I paint objects as I think them, not as I see them
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: A discerning eye needs only a hint, and understatement leaves the imagination free to build its own elaborations
en_quotes.author: Russell Page

en_quotes.quote: A certificate of live birth is not the same thing by any stretch of the imagination as a birth certificate
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: All the works of man have their origin in creative fantasy. What right have we then to depreciate imagination
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: An idea is salvation by imagination
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: Let us leave pretty women to men devoid of imagination
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: One of the virtues of being very young is that you don't let the facts get in the way of your imagination
en_quotes.author: Sam Levenson

en_quotes.quote: Music inspires contemplation, dreams, and the imagination
en_quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

en_quotes.quote: The imagination is a muscle. If it is not exercised, it atrophies
en_quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

en_quotes.quote: The great instrument of moral good is the imagination
en_quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

en_quotes.quote: In the world of words, the imagination is one of the forces of nature
en_quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

en_quotes.quote: If I am writing down something and it is my idea, my imagination, it won't be fact
en_quotes.author: Disha Patani

en_quotes.quote: I've spent my life butting my head against other people's lack of imagination
en_quotes.author: Nick Cave

en_quotes.quote: The soul without imagination is what an observatory would be without a telescope
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Preschool children are virtuosos of imagination
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

en_quotes.quote: I always imagined I could be what I wanted to be
en_quotes.author: Chris Brown

en_quotes.quote: To accomplish great things we must first dream, then visualize, then plan... believe... act!
en_quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

en_quotes.quote: He who does not think much of himself is much more esteemed than he imagines
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is more fearful than imagination without taste
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: This is one of those cases in which the imagination is baffled by the facts
en_quotes.author: Adam Smith

en_quotes.quote: My job is to make sure there's something about each dress that ignites the bride's imagination
en_quotes.author: Jenny Packham

en_quotes.quote: For those who have obtained unobstructed knowledge of Self, the world is seen merely as a bondage causing imagination
en_quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

en_quotes.quote: One is never fortunate or as unfortunate as one imagines
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Belief in the supernatural reflects a failure of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Edward Abbey

en_quotes.quote: Anything you put your mind to and add your imagination into can make your life a lot better and a lot more fun
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: My imagination is a twisted place
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Don Quixote's misfortune is not his imagination, but Sancho Panza
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: When I started the Imagination Library in my hometown, I never dreamed that one day we would be helping Scottish kids
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Fools act on imagination without knowledge, pedants act on knowledge without imagination
en_quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

en_quotes.quote: Great leaders communicate a vision that captures the imagination and fires the hearts and minds of those around them
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: Ideas control the world
en_quotes.author: James A. Garfield

en_quotes.quote: Some stories are true that never happened
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: It takes no imagination to live within your means
en_quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

en_quotes.quote: Bring ideas in and entertain them royally, for one of them may be the king
en_quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

en_quotes.quote: If you just storyboard something, you've already planned it, and you're stuck in the limitations of your imagination
en_quotes.author: Daniel Espinosa

en_quotes.quote: The imagination is a pretty precious source of protection
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Ray

en_quotes.quote: The world is governed by very different personages from what is imagined by those who are not behind the scenes
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: There are many ways to be free. One of them is to transcend reality by imagination, as I try to do
en_quotes.author: Anais Nin

en_quotes.quote: Imagination grows by exercise, and contrary to common belief, is more powerful in the mature than in the young
en_quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

en_quotes.quote: Learn to see things as they really are, not as we imagine they are
en_quotes.author: Vernon Howard

en_quotes.quote: My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world, and exiles me from it
en_quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is a polite word for dead but not buried imagination
en_quotes.author: e. e. cummings

en_quotes.quote: Life is only a dream and we are the imagination of ourselves
en_quotes.author: Bill Hicks

en_quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts in life - only those we imagine
en_quotes.author: Frank Leahy

en_quotes.quote: There can be no passion, and by consequence no love, where there is not imagination
en_quotes.author: William Godwin

en_quotes.quote: Justice is to be found only in imagination
en_quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

en_quotes.quote: Imagination disposes of everything; it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which are everything in this world
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Imagination decides everything
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: War, except in self-defense, is a failure of moral imagination
en_quotes.author: Bill Moyers

en_quotes.quote: We especially need imagination in science
en_quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: One can live in the shadow of an idea without grasping it
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

en_quotes.quote: In the imagination, Harlem will always be the spiritual capital of black excellence in America
en_quotes.author: Cheo Hodari Coker

en_quotes.quote: Where there is no imagination there is no horror
en_quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

en_quotes.quote: I paint what cannot be photographed, that which comes from the imagination or from dreams, or from an unconscious drive
en_quotes.author: Man Ray

en_quotes.quote: My books are inert as cordwood till a reader's imagination ignites one and an old flame jumps to life
en_quotes.author: David James Duncan

en_quotes.quote: I may have been sexy, but I was covered up total. There was something left to the imagination
en_quotes.author: Suzi Quatro

en_quotes.quote: Love doesn't grow on trees like apples in Eden - it's something you have to make. And you must use your imagination too
en_quotes.author: Joyce Cary

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is not something apart and hermetic, not a way of leaving reality behind; it is a way of engaging reality
en_quotes.author: Irving Howe

en_quotes.quote: You have all the reason in the world to achieve your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: They are ill discoverers that think there is no land, when they can see nothing but sea
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Liberty: One of Imagination's most precious possessions
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: If you use your imagination, you can look at any actress and see her nude... I hope to make you use your imagination
en_quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is ideal, it is the work of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

en_quotes.quote: Were it not for imagination a man would be as happy in arms of a chambermaid as of a duchess
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is a poor matter when it has to part company with understanding
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: People can die of mere imagination
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

en_quotes.quote: A writer should have the precision of a poet and the imagination of a scientist
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

en_quotes.quote: Faith is spiritualized imagination
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: I used my imagination to make the grass whatever color I wanted it to be
en_quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

en_quotes.quote: There aren't any fences to the imagination, and so there shouldn't be any for books
en_quotes.author: Matt Haig

en_quotes.quote: I felt the pressure of imagination against the doors of my mind was so great that they were going to burst
en_quotes.author: J. G. Ballard

en_quotes.quote: Imagination makes us shape better stories, sure, but it also allows us to multiply possibilities
en_quotes.author: Amitava Kumar

en_quotes.quote: A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something
en_quotes.author: Frank Capra

en_quotes.quote: People can't just listen to the music and have their own imagination and take them where they wanna go
en_quotes.author: Ann Wilson

en_quotes.quote: What better way to expand your imagination than to read!
en_quotes.author: Laura Marano

en_quotes.quote: I can't work completely out of my imagination. I must put my foot in a bit of truth; and then I can fly free
en_quotes.author: Andrew Wyeth

en_quotes.quote: I was raised not to be afraid to show emotion or imagination
en_quotes.author: Javier Bardem

en_quotes.quote: The greatest gift you have been given is the gift of your imagination - what do you dream of wanting to do?
en_quotes.author: Amanda Lindhout

en_quotes.quote: I like endings that let your imagination do a lot of the work
en_quotes.author: Matt Bomer

en_quotes.quote: Philosophy and Art both render the invisible visible by imagination
en_quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

en_quotes.quote: The past is really almost as much a work of the imagination as the future
en_quotes.author: Jessamyn West

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is the air of mind
en_quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Imagination only comes when you privilege the subconscious, when you make delay and procrastination work for you
en_quotes.author: Hilary Mantel

en_quotes.quote: The study of history requires investigation, imagination, empathy, and respect. Reverence just doesn't enter into it
en_quotes.author: Jill Lepore

en_quotes.quote: A disaster where marble has been substituted for imagination
en_quotes.author: Ada Louise Huxtable

en_quotes.quote: Make sure you visualize what you really want, not what someone else wants for you
en_quotes.author: Jerry Gillies

en_quotes.quote: Possessing a healthy imagination is a necessary ingredient for creativity
en_quotes.author: Steve Vai

en_quotes.quote: I always find with dramas that the more that's left to the imagination of the audience, the better
en_quotes.author: Jodie Comer

en_quotes.quote: Although technology has enhanced our lives in many ways, it has also ensured the erosion of imagination
en_quotes.author: Alexandra Adornetto

en_quotes.quote: Peter Jackson has the sort of imagination that no one else has
en_quotes.author: Lee Pace

en_quotes.quote: For a food lover with a big imagination, there's nothing worse than eating the exact same meal several days in a row
en_quotes.author: Damaris Phillips

en_quotes.quote: As an actor, the only thing you have is your instinct and your imagination
en_quotes.author: Toby Stephens

en_quotes.quote: I guess what I've learned is that there are no boundaries when it comes to imagination. It's limitless
en_quotes.author: Cliff Martinez

en_quotes.quote: When you're young you have no worries, no drama, only your imagination. It's the best!
en_quotes.author: Devon Werkheiser

en_quotes.quote: When I was on my own in a hotel room in Romania, I had the imagination to keep myself occupied
en_quotes.author: Rhona Mitra

en_quotes.quote: It's the imagination that is involved in sci-fi, and fantasy is what draws me to it. Stories, everything
en_quotes.author: Mark Sheppard

en_quotes.quote: The best way to enhance a child's imagination is to make them read
en_quotes.author: Ken Spillman

en_quotes.quote: Scientists have to have a metaphor. All scientists start with imagination
en_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

en_quotes.quote: To imagine is everything, to know is nothing at all
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: To treat your facts with imagination is one thing, to imagine your facts is another
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers
en_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

en_quotes.quote: I just had a crazy, wild imagination all my life, and science fiction is the greatest outlet for me
en_quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

en_quotes.quote: He is the true enchanter, whose spell operates, not upon the senses, but upon the imagination and the heart
en_quotes.author: Washington Irving

en_quotes.quote: I accept that there may be things far grander and more incomprehensible than we can possibly imagine
en_quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

en_quotes.quote: Given free rein, our imagination can get infinite
en_quotes.author: Jim Harrison

en_quotes.quote: Reason respects the differences, and imagination the similitudes of things
en_quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

en_quotes.quote: The imagination is man's power over nature
en_quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

en_quotes.quote: What's cool is when you're able to give your audience imagination and you don't have to cage them in like animals
en_quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

en_quotes.quote: Ray Bradbury is one who is contributing to the understanding of the imagination and the curiosity of the human race
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: I have a visual imagination
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

en_quotes.quote: Every comic delves into the personal archive when their imagination runs dry
en_quotes.author: James Acaster

en_quotes.quote: I grew up with interesting and funny people. We made our own fun. You had to use your imagination
en_quotes.author: James Acaster

en_quotes.quote: Life is possible only by the deficiencies of our imagination and memory
en_quotes.author: Emil Cioran

en_quotes.quote: The source and center of all man's creative power... is his power of making images, or the power of imagination
en_quotes.author: Robert Collier

en_quotes.quote: He who has imagination without learning has wings but no feet
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: One who has imagination without learning has wings without feet
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: Imagination has a great deal to do with winning
en_quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

en_quotes.quote: It is above all by the imagination that we achieve perception and compassion and hope
en_quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

en_quotes.quote: We are all innovators, we all like to use our imagination, which is our greatest tool
en_quotes.author: Cory Booker

en_quotes.quote: Taste refers to the past, imagination to the future
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Imagination has rules, but we can only guess what they are
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: People write memoirs because they lack the imagination to make things up
en_quotes.author: Tom Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Genius is an African who dreams up snow
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

en_quotes.quote: Dollar bills have absolutely no value except in our collective imagination, but everybody believes in the dollar bill
en_quotes.author: Yuval Noah Harari

en_quotes.quote: I had a pretty sexual imagination for a kid
en_quotes.author: Janet Jackson

en_quotes.quote: People who don't see their nature and imagine they can practice thoughtlessness all the time are lairs and fools
en_quotes.author: Bodhidharma

en_quotes.quote: The scientific imagination always restrains itself within the limits of probability
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Everything is creative. It's all relative to me. No matter what, you've gotta use your imagination, use your senses
en_quotes.author: Action Bronson

en_quotes.quote: We imagine that we want to escape our selfish and commonplace existence, but we cling desperately to our chains
en_quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

en_quotes.quote: I don't profess to be Shonda Rhimes by any stretch of the imagination, or Dick Wolf. They're icons. I'm a filmmaker
en_quotes.author: Lee Daniels

en_quotes.quote: Appealing workplaces are to be avoided. One wants a room with no view, so imagination can meet memory in the dark
en_quotes.author: Annie Dillard

en_quotes.quote: It's amazing what you can do with an E in A-Level art, a twisted imagination and a chainsaw
en_quotes.author: Damien Hirst

en_quotes.quote: Imagination should always be treasured, even when it's slightly off-key
en_quotes.author: Genesis P-Orridge

en_quotes.quote: I've done a lot of bad things. Use your imagination
en_quotes.author: Katy Perry

en_quotes.quote: I have no idea why I write. The old standards are: I like to express my feelings, stretch my imagination, earn money
en_quotes.author: S. E. Hinton

en_quotes.quote: The realities of the world seldom measure up to the sublime designs of human imagination
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: To have frequent recourse to narrative betrays great want of imagination
en_quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

en_quotes.quote: India-Pakistan matches always capture the imagination of people from either side
en_quotes.author: MS Dhoni

en_quotes.quote: Imagination needs to be fed
en_quotes.author: Barbara Januszkiewicz

en_quotes.quote: An idea is a putting truth in check-mate
en_quotes.author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

en_quotes.quote: Believing you're something that you're not excites the mind and the imagination. And it's hopeful
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: I've learned that borders are where the actual ends, but also where the imagination and the story begins
en_quotes.author: Amy Purdy

en_quotes.quote: Man lives by imagination
en_quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

en_quotes.quote: This is not a family of privilege by any stretch of the imagination. Our family is very low key
en_quotes.author: Maya Soetoro-Ng

en_quotes.quote: What I really have in my head, my imagination, my understanding of music, I never really get that out
en_quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

en_quotes.quote: The first piece of music that captured my imagination was probably Ray Charles Live At Newport
en_quotes.author: Van Morrison

en_quotes.quote: I want to liberate my imagination and my mind with every kind of movie. That is what I wanted to do all my life
en_quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

en_quotes.quote: One longs for a director with a sense of imagination
en_quotes.author: Alan Rickman

en_quotes.quote: I believe that imagination inspires nations. It's something that I live by
en_quotes.author: Janelle Monae

en_quotes.quote: We humans lack imagination, to the point of not even knowing what tomorrow's important things will look like
en_quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

en_quotes.quote: I live in my imagination, so sometimes movies help me get lost. I feel like I'm in it
en_quotes.author: SZA

en_quotes.quote: Panic is a sudden desertion of us, and a going over to the enemy of our imagination
en_quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

en_quotes.quote: I've got a pretty wild imagination, and a lot of times, I have to be reeled back in
en_quotes.author: Finn Balor

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a passive person by any stretch of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Courteney Cox

en_quotes.quote: I don't think it's possible to touch people's imagination today by aesthetic means
en_quotes.author: J. G. Ballard

en_quotes.quote: Because of my faith and my imagination, I was able to enjoy my childhood, even though it was tough
en_quotes.author: Donna Brazile

en_quotes.quote: The most dire disaster in love is the death of imagination
en_quotes.author: George Meredith

en_quotes.quote: You know what's better than building things up in your imagination? Building things up in real life
en_quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

en_quotes.quote: With imagination and personal creativity, people who sew can design the way they look to suit themselves
en_quotes.author: Issey Miyake

en_quotes.quote: All the best have something in common, a regard for reality, an agreement to its primacy over the imagination
en_quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

en_quotes.quote: There's no reason for your imagination to be fettered by money
en_quotes.author: Kevin McCloud

en_quotes.quote: I've always had a slightly overactive imagination
en_quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

en_quotes.quote: I love theatrics and have a huge imagination: Why would I want to sit onstage and sing a bunch of ballads back-to-back?
en_quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

en_quotes.quote: A person possessed with an idea cannot be reasoned with
en_quotes.author: James Anthony Froude

en_quotes.quote: It would be a bitter cosmic joke if we destroy ourselves due to atrophy of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

en_quotes.quote: By going over your day in imagination before you begin it, you can begin acting successfully at any moment
en_quotes.author: Dorothea Brande

en_quotes.quote: I guess I'm a very keen observer, and I'd like to think I have a good imagination
en_quotes.author: Eric Bana

en_quotes.quote: To my mind the boy who gives least promise is one in whom the critical faculty develops in advance of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Quintilian

en_quotes.quote: If the reporter has killed our imagination with his truth, he threatens our life with his lies
en_quotes.author: Karl Kraus

en_quotes.quote: I have more of a vivid imagination than I have talent. I cook up ideas. It's just a characteristic
en_quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

en_quotes.quote: I have deliberately left Sylvester and Julia's appearances to the reader's imagination
en_quotes.author: Mary Wesley

en_quotes.quote: When one paints an ideal, one does not need to limit one's imagination
en_quotes.author: Ellen Key

en_quotes.quote: I imagine, therefore I belong and am free
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is Reality Lite - a useful substitute when the real pleasure is inaccessible, too risky, or too much work
en_quotes.author: Paul Bloom

en_quotes.quote: I have a very vivid imagination
en_quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: I have an active imagination
en_quotes.author: Anya Taylor-Joy

en_quotes.quote: Cinema is a world of imagination
en_quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

en_quotes.quote: I use a lot of film images, analogies, and imagination
en_quotes.author: Carlos Fuentes

en_quotes.quote: I am not interested in slice of life, what I want is a slice of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Carlos Fuentes

en_quotes.quote: While the sciences are hugely important, let us not leave behind a child's imagination
en_quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

en_quotes.quote: I never did very well in math - I could never seem to persuade the teacher that I hadn't meant my answers literally
en_quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

en_quotes.quote: India lends itself well to fictionalization, but ultimately, it all depends on the writer's imagination
en_quotes.author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni

en_quotes.quote: I am putting real plums into an imaginary cake
en_quotes.author: Mary McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: You need imagination in order to imagine a future that doesn't exist
en_quotes.author: Azar Nafisi

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the imagination. What I cannot see is infinitely more important than what I can see
en_quotes.author: Duane Michals

en_quotes.quote: I do not 'get' ideas; ideas get me
en_quotes.author: Robertson Davies

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is not the exclusive appanage of artists, but belongs in varying degrees to all men
en_quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

en_quotes.quote: Vision is the true creative rhythm
en_quotes.author: Robert Delaunay

en_quotes.quote: I discovered that my imagination came alive when I moved away from the immediate world around me
en_quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

en_quotes.quote: You - and I have to remind myself of this - are capable beyond your wildest imagination
en_quotes.author: Priscilla Chan

en_quotes.quote: He is indebted to his memory for his jests and to his imagination for his facts
en_quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

en_quotes.quote: It takes as much imagination to create debt as to create income
en_quotes.author: Leonard Orr

en_quotes.quote: The unfortunate reality is the alt-right has captured white people's imagination
en_quotes.author: Patrisse Cullors

en_quotes.quote: I hope my kids see imagination has power to change everything
en_quotes.author: Wangechi Mutu

en_quotes.quote: Everything you do on set is directly related to your imagination when you read the script for the first time
en_quotes.author: Ewan McGregor

en_quotes.quote: I loved the world of imagination
en_quotes.author: R. A. Salvatore

en_quotes.quote: Everything, I think, about acting is based on imagination
en_quotes.author: Christina Ricci

en_quotes.quote: There is no connection between the political ideas of our educated class and the deep places of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Lionel Trilling

en_quotes.quote: The American imagination has never been able to fully recover from its white-supremacist beginnings
en_quotes.author: Claudia Rankine

en_quotes.quote: My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art
en_quotes.author: Clara Schumann

en_quotes.quote: I just loved the feeling of performing, of using my imagination to take me somewhere else
en_quotes.author: Melissa Benoist

en_quotes.quote: Imagination is as good as many voyages - and how much cheaper!
en_quotes.author: George William Curtis

en_quotes.quote: Fiction reveals truths that reality obscures
en_quotes.author: Jessamyn West

en_quotes.quote: Imagination - that's the future for us
en_quotes.author: Jan Brett

en_quotes.quote: I visualize things in my mind before I have to do them. It's like having a mental workshop
en_quotes.author: Jack Youngblood

en_quotes.quote: Politics is the enemy of the imagination
en_quotes.author: Ian Mcewan

en_quotes.quote: True intelligence requires fabulous imagination
en_quotes.author: Ian Mcewan

en_quotes.quote: Literary imagination is an aesthetic object offered by a writer to a lover of books
en_quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

en_quotes.quote: But who can paint like Nature? Can imagination boast, amid its gay creation, hues like hers?
en_quotes.author: James Thomson

en_quotes.quote: I think imagination is a crazy thing, and that's what makes the world go around
en_quotes.author: Shahid Khan

en_quotes.quote: I was a terrible athlete and a pretty bad student. I couldn't focus. My imagination was always racing
en_quotes.author: Lisi Harrison

en_quotes.quote: I think life is about having the mixture of the curiosity of an older person and the imagination of a child
en_quotes.author: Daphne Guinness

en_quotes.quote: If you're so afraid of your imagination that you stifle it, how are you going to know God? How can you imagine heaven?
en_quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

en_quotes.quote: Never forget that the key to the situation lies in the will and not in the imagination
en_quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

en_quotes.quote: Acting is an expression of imagination. No firsthand knowledge is necessary
en_quotes.author: Billy Crudup

en_quotes.quote: I think courage is commensurate with your fear - if you lack imagination and you're fearless, that's not courage to me
en_quotes.author: Phyllida Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: Only in your imagination can you revise
en_quotes.author: Fay Wray

en_quotes.quote: Personality is more important than beauty, but imagination is more important than both of them
en_quotes.author: Laurette Taylor

en_quotes.quote: The idea of love as a mysterious, undiscovered world has come to have no place in our innermost imagination
en_quotes.author: John Cassavetes

en_quotes.quote: George has only got to ring me. His imagination is so wonderful, I'd do any character he might create
en_quotes.author: Peter Mayhew

en_quotes.quote: The most imaginative people are the most credulous, for them everything is possible
en_quotes.author: Alexander Chase

en_quotes.quote: I love using my imagination. I love writing about animals
en_quotes.author: Mary Pope Osborne

en_quotes.quote: We may not imagine how our lives could be more frustrating and complex - but Congress can
en_quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

en_quotes.quote: I am more connected to the world of the imagination, but you don't have to have polio to do that
en_quotes.author: Ben Lewin

en_quotes.quote: The only sure weapon against bad ideas is better ideas
en_quotes.author: Alfred Whitney Griswold

en_quotes.quote: What we imagine is order is merely the prevailing form of chaos
en_quotes.author: Kerry Thornley

en_quotes.quote: The best way to renew thought is to go outside the human imagination
en_quotes.author: Bernard Werber

en_quotes.quote: I am better able to imagine hell than heaven; it is my inheritance, I suppose
en_quotes.author: Elinor Wylie
